test.name: 1.Control of the number of items in the basket

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

Wait And Send Text
Wait For Element

Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

This method waits for the item in the page source loaded P.S : This method doesn't expect to visible. Timeout variable is waiting time. Can change with this variable Interval variable is recheck interval.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
This method is using for filling text inputs and areas
